name: 陳政順
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。
機械設計原理、機密機械特有設計考慮、機械結構件之靜態、動態、與熱傳分析。機械次系統單元如主軸單元、動力驅動、進給驅動、與控制系統等之設計與分析。機械之精度與效能分析。工具機之實務設計與分析個案研究。
schedule:
1. Introduction
2. Accuracy and precision
3/4/5. Mechanical design process
6/7 Design principles
8/9  Analysis and Design of Structural components
10/11  Analysis and Design of Spindle unit design
12. Exam
13/14. Analysis and Design of feed drive system
15/16. Optimum design of structure components
17. Case study & presentation
18. Case study & presentation
scorePolicy: 平時成績(課堂表現.作業等)30 %, 考試 40%, 專題 30%.
materials: The mechanical design process by Ullman & 講義
